column4: Can someone help me to find where evoultion stores it's files.  I wanna add the evolution icon to the launchbar
for the command just enter in "evoultion"
then maybe in /usr/share/pixmaps/evolution ... not sure, one or the other either way

right click on Desktop, show hidden files?
